Title: Opening a Shop Window on Douyin with Zero Followers
Content: To open a shop window on Douyin with zero followers, follow these steps: First, open the Douyin app and click on the three horizontal lines in the top right corner. Select 'Creator Center' and then click on the account at the top. Next, click on 'Real-name Authentication.' If you haven't completed this step, do so now, as it must match the person linked to your payment account. Follow the prompts to complete the authentication. Once authenticated, return to the 'Creator Service Center' and click on 'All Functions.' Scroll down to find 'E-commerce with Goods,' which will be greyed out if not activated. Click 'Join Douyin E-commerce,' agree to the authorization, and select 'Individual' using your ID card. Upload the front and back of your ID and fill in the required phone number and email. Submit the information and wait for the review, which takes 1-3 days. After approval, return to the 'Creator Service Center' and find the activated e-commerce function. Note that without 1,000 followers and a deposit, you can only use the shop window feature. Once you meet the follower requirement, you can explore other options like video or live-streaming sales.

Title: Completing Real-name Authentication on Douyin
Content: Real-name authentication on Douyin is crucial for accessing various features, including e-commerce. To complete this process, navigate to the 'Creator Center' by clicking the three horizontal lines in the top right corner of the app. Select your account at the top and then click on 'Real-name Authentication.' Follow the on-screen instructions to agree to the terms and complete the authentication. This involves uploading the front and back of your ID card and ensuring that the name matches the person linked to your payment account. Fill in the required phone number and email, then submit the information. The review process typically takes 1-3 days. Once approved, you can access additional features in the 'Creator Service Center,' such as e-commerce functions. This step is essential for ensuring that your account is verified and can be used for transactions.

Title: Utilizing Douyin's E-commerce Features
Content: Douyin offers various e-commerce features that can be utilized once your account is verified and you have completed real-name authentication. To access these features, go to the 'Creator Service Center' and click on 'All Functions.' Scroll down to find 'E-commerce with Goods' and click 'Join Douyin E-commerce.' Agree to the authorization and select 'Individual' using your ID card. Upload the necessary documents and submit the information. After approval, you can access the e-commerce functions. Initially, with fewer than 1,000 followers and without a deposit, you can only use the shop window feature. However, once you meet the follower requirement, you can explore other options like video or live-streaming sales. To find popular products, go to the 'Product Selection Plaza' and use the search function to browse various rankings and find trending items. This allows you to select products that are likely to attract more attention and sales.
